# asset

**Instance Property**

The asset provided during initialization.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var asset: AVAsset { get }
```

## Accessing initialization parameters

- **automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys**: The array of asset keys to be automatically loaded before the player item is ready to play.
